pages.text: A mundane, unfired clay jar that can be heated to harden.
A mundane contained usually used for $(l:fumes/fumes)Collecting Fumes$(/l) in a $(item)Witches' Oven$().
A noxious vapor distilled from arcane remnants, likely to linger where curses were cast. Approach with caution. Common crafting ingredient.
An ethereal mist born from crystalline whispers, holding fleeting glimpses of untold power. Handle with wonder. Common crafting ingredient.
A caustic elixir, rumored to originate from the venom of ancient serpents. Keep far from prying eyes. Common crafting ingredient.
A breath of ancient mysticism, drawn from the depths of the forest's forbidden secrets. Use with reverence. Common crafting ingredient.
A delicate breeze imbued with divine grace, capturing whispers from the realms beyond. Wield with awe. Common crafting ingredient.
A rare droplet of celestial sorrow, shimmering with the secrets of the heavens. Cherish its elusive power. Common crafting ingredient.
A whisper of life reborn, extracted from the essence of nature's endless cycle. Embrace its renewal. Common crafting ingredient.
An elusive scent, said to be bottled from the very essence of spells cast in moonlit nights. Use sparingly. Common crafting ingredient.
A sinister concoction of essence and dread, its purpose shrouded in dark intentions. Handle with care. Common crafting ingredient.
A fragrant essence distilled from untouched realms, carrying whispers of sanctity. Preserve its innocence. Common crafting ingredient.
A fleeting essence of fortune, captured from the whims of fate itself. Keep close, and fortune may follow. Common crafting ingredient.
A mystical condensation, rumored to condense under the watchful eyes of the $(item)Endermen$(). Store with curiosity. Common crafting ingredient.
A potent draught rumored to pulse with the rage of fallen demons, drawn from the darkest of rituals. Use in the shadows. Common crafting ingredient.

A nectar of insatiable desire, whispered to lure even the strongest will. Handle with caution; its pull is irresistible.$(p)Usually dropped by $(l:creatures/nightmare)Nightmares$(/l) when killed in the $(l:dimensions/spirit_world)Spirit World$(/l). Common crafting ingredient, most notably it is involved in the making of $(l:artifacts/dream_weavers/nightmare)Dream Weavers$(/l).
A serene draught, whispered to have the power to cleanse the darkest of curses. Sip with trust. Common crafting ingredient.
A concentrated essence of determination, distilled from the unwavering resolve of heroes past. Guard its strength. Common crafting ingredient.
An essence forged from the shadows of nightmares, distilled into a palpable dread. Wield with trepidation. Common crafting ingredient.
